entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 70S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 20 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS AROUND 80
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS AROUND 70
HIGHS AROUND 90
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
